scripts.test-routes:
curl -s http://localhost:3000/api/test-all | bun -e 'const data = JSON.parse(await Bun.stdin.text()); console.log("
üß™ Route Test Results:"); console.log("‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê"); console.log(`‚úÖ Successful: ${data.summary.successful}/${data.summary.total}`); console.log(`‚ùå Failed: ${data.summary.failed}/${data.summary.total}`); console.log(`‚è±Ô∏è  Total Time: ${data.summary.totalDuration}`); console.log("
üìã Details:"); data.results.forEach(r => console.log(`${r.success ? "‚úÖ" : "‚ùå"} ${r.method.padEnd(6)} ${r.path.padEnd(25)} ${r.status} (${r.duration})`)); console.log("
");'
